Noun: the act of creating written works
the work of a writer; anything expressed in letters of the alphabet (especially when considered from the point of view of style and effec)
letters or symbols that are written or imprinted on a surface to represent the sounds or words of a language
the activity of putting something in written form
Verb: mark or trace on a surface
write or name the letters that comprise the conventionally accepted form of (a word or part of a wor)
create code, write a computer program
